branchCategory.name: CM3
branchCategory.description: Series CM3 double acting, single rod cylinders are a fully functional, compact cylinder used for space saving designs.  The CM3 series offers a variety of mounting options and is auto switch capable.  The CM3 is now RoHS compliant.

branchItem.name: C(D)M3 Air Cylinder, Double Acting, Single Rod, Short Type
branchItem.description: Series CM3 double acting, single rod cylinders are a fully functional, compact cylinder used for space saving designs.  The CM3 series offers a variety of mounting options and is auto switch capable.  The CM3 is now RoHS compliant.
